developer: Internet Services Polen Sp. z o.o.
description:
Discover the local choice for meals, groceries, and food delivery with foodpanda!

Life can get overwhelming, but we’re here to help! Whether you need daily meals, groceries, or shopping essentials, foodpanda has got you covered with convenient food delivery.

Order Your Favourite Food with Just 3 Simple Taps!

With foodpanda, you can easily choose the food you love, and we’ll deliver it right to your door. Serving millions across over 400 cities in 11 Asian markets — Singapore, Hong Kong, Thailand, Malaysia, Pakistan, Taiwan, the Philippines, Bangladesh, Laos, Cambodia, and Myanmar — foodpanda is your go-to for everyday food delivery.

Endless Food and Grocery Delivery Choices at Your Fingertips!
Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or fried chicken? We know the best restaurants near you – big famous brands and tiny local faves. Best part? We've got exclusive discounts and promos waiting for all new foodies. With a simple click, your food and groceries are on their way with fast delivery!

Need Groceries? We’ve Got You Covered!
Want to cook but short on time? Imagine having fresh produce, pantry staples, frozen goods, personal care items, your cute pets' needs, and much more, delivered in a flash — everything you need for a hassle-free home-cooked meal, all available through our speedy groceries delivery service from foodpanda shops and pandamarts.

Best Food and Grocery Delivery Deals Just for You!
Looking for the best savings on groceries and food? We regularly update our daily deals, personalised just for you! Here’s a tip: skip the queue and choose self pick-up for extra savings on your grocery orders, or enjoy the convenience of our food delivery options.

Save on tasty takeaways.
On the go? Try pick-up! Skip the queue and save up when you self-collect your order.

Worry-free package delivery.
Need to send or receive a parcel? Go with pandago. Our reliable fleet and on-demand delivery service will safely deliver it for you in no time.

Our tech is shaped by you.
Explore personalised offers and delicious picks just for you. Dish out what you feel about your order and let foodies know what’s yum. 

Want More? Join pandapro!
Unlock even greater savings on food delivery and grocery options with our pandapro membership today!

Live like a panda and let us take care of the rest — let’s do it the panda way with seamless food delivery!

For more info, please visit our website.

About this app
Enjoy The Premier Service! Food & Parcel Delivery.

App description
Fatty gives the Food & Parcel delivery service in Premier & Faster & Reliable way in LASHIO city, Shan state, Myanmar.

Much more delicious foods are now available on Fatty App!
Such as 
- Breakfast (Noodle, Dumpling, Tea etc.)
- Lunch (Fried Rice, Hamburger, Snack etc.)
- Dinner
- Drinks
- BBQ

Faster & Reliable parcel delivery service is on Fatty App!
- Send File, parcel
- Pickup Parcel from car station
- Send parcel someone in somewhere else
Much more premier service is now on Fatty App!

Satisfy your cravings with Quick Food, the fastest and most convenient food delivery application available on the App Store. Say goodbye to long waits and order your favorite meals with just a few taps.
Discover a seamless and user-friendly interface that brings an extensive selection of delectable dishes right to your doorstep. With Quick Food, you can explore a wide range of cuisines, from local favorites to international delights, all at your fingertips.
Key Features:
1. Fast Delivery: Get your food delivered to your doorstep in record time. We prioritize speed and efficiency, ensuring that you enjoy your meal while it's still hot and fresh.
2. Easy Ordering Process: Place your order effortlessly with our intuitive interface. Browse through menus, customize your preferences, and track your delivery in real-time, all within the app.
3. Extensive Restaurant Network: Choose from a vast network of partner restaurants and eateries. We've partnered with the best establishments in town to offer you a diverse selection of high-quality and flavorful options.
4. Customization Options: Personalize your order to suit your taste buds. Whether you prefer extra sauce, a specific ingredient, or a dietary restriction, Quick Food allows you to customize your meal just the way you like it.
5. Secure and Reliable Payments: Enjoy a hassle-free payment experience with our secure and reliable payment options. Pay directly through the app, eliminating the need for cash transactions.
6. Our application (Quick Food) made it possible to register with minimum information [Phone Number & User Full Name, Email is optional].
7. Quick Food application include an option to use credit to order feature. For those customers who want to use credit will need to fill customer data for KYC because of our government (Myanmar) law. 
8. Credit: Eat Now, Pay Later for Corporate Staff. 
9. Ratings and Reviews: Make informed decisions by checking ratings and reviews from other customers. Get recommendations on popular dishes and discover new culinary gems in your area.
10. Favorites and Order History: Easily reorder your favorite meals or explore your order history for quick reference. Quick Food remembers your preferences, making your future orders even more convenient.
Download Quick Food now and experience the future of food delivery. Enjoy the convenience, speed, and delightful flavors brought directly to your doorstep. Get started today and satisfy your cravings with Quick Food!
Note: Quick Food currently serves select cities. Check the app for availability in your area.
Customer Support: We're here to assist you. Contact our dedicated customer support team at [01-4706363], or contact@quickfoodmm.com for any inquiries or assistance you may need.
We appreciate your feedback! Leave a review on the App Store and let us know how we can further improve your Quick Food experience.
Download Quick Food now and enjoy delicious meals at your fingertips!
Food Delivery application.

LINE MAN your number one supporter. More benefits, with integrated half price co-pay and "The more you spend, the more you get" campaign. Delivery fee starts at 0 baht and pays for meals along with up to 60% discount code. Download now.

A delivery application that readily answers to all of your needs with four quality services that really grasp Thai lifestyle.

Mobile Ordering																						
Empower your experience with us! Tailor your order exactly as you desire, placing it in advance, and collect it at your leisure, precisely when it still in perfection. We'll alert you when it is ready for pickup.																						
																						
Earn reward points and receive free gifts																						
Earn valuable reward points with THE DISTRICT App for purchases made in-app or in-store. Your tier level determines the points and benefits you'll enjoy, and you can redeem your earned points for future purchases.																						
																						
Manage gift cards																						
In just a few simple steps, customers can acquire digital gift cards for personal use or share them with others. Choose from our wide selection in the gift card gallery and conveniently make payments through the app or in-store. You also have the flexibility to transfer and consolidate credit from your existing cards.																						
																						
Store list																						
Customers will be able to search and pick any participating store from the store list, get information as well as make orders.																						
																						
THE DISTRICT  App and it’s features are only available at selected participating stores. Restriction apply.																						
For more information, please visit www.thedistrictcoffeelounge.com.

[Product Features]
With free switch between Chinese, English, Khmer, Vietnamese, Lao, Thai, Korean, Japanese, Indonesian, etc., E-GetS APP can translate the names of all cuisines (Chinese, Western, Khmer, Thai, Vietnamese, Korean...) into your mother tongue, giving you barrier-free experience in food delivery. 
We also boast a professional delivery team. With simply an order and an address, we could deliver whatever you want to wherever you are.
E-GETS, ENJOY EASY LIFE!

①Various food brands: KFC, McDonald's, Pizza Hut, Starbucks Various foods nearby: Chinese, Western, Khmer; hot pot, BBQ, bakery, burgers; breakfast, afternoon tea, night snack; desserts, flowers, fruits & vegetables, fresh food, sushi, coffee, Chinese supermarket groceries..."
②Worry-free shopping of daily necessities: We always offer you surprise discounts for popular items. We have exclusive cooperation with various quality brands. Just do your worry-free shopping at Dola Mart!
③Group buying: Have fun, save money, you can have both! We offer you quality group buying services for nearly everything, manicure, spa, ticket, and hotel... You can experience new things with great discounts.
④Express: We offer you timely door-to-door express service. Documents, certificates, keys, cakes, flowers, digital products…… Our punctuality is your greatest guarantee.
⑤ Air ticket: Our flights cover China, Vietnam, Cambodia, Laos, and other countries. Official booking channels, fast ticket issuing, worry-free journy.
⑥ZTO Express: You make an order online, we pick up your package door-to-door. Our ZTO Express covers throughout Cambodia. You can check the real-time logistic status online to know your package information.

[New User Benefits] New users may get a $5 red envelope!

[Quality Service] Fast delivery, on-time guarantee, reliable merchants. We try our best to offer you safe, convenient, fast, and considerate food delivery service.

[On-time guarantee] With the "on-time guarantee", we ensure that each order is delivered on time. For delayed delivery, we will compensate you a red envelope for your next order.

[Functions]
Global cuisine
Entertainment
Express
Group Buying
Dola Mart
On-Time Guarantee
Quality brands
Timely notification
Smart filter of restaurant
Drink promo
Order Reviews
Online payment/Cash on delivery
"Don't hesitate, make your order at E-GetS now!
E-GETS, ENJOY EASY LIFE!"

[About Us]
E-GetS, is a quality local life service platform. The company, with "Enjoy Easy Life!" as its philosophy and innovative technology as its competence, is committed to building a leading one-stop life service platform in Southeast Asia and even all over the world. It aims to drive the digitalization in Southeast Asia and redefine urban life, bringing the new Internet plus life experience to users for their better and more convenient life.
With the point-to-plane extension of local life and new retailing, the improvement of the logistical supply chain and the access of stores and business districts, people will own their exclusive life circle three kilometers around wherever they are in the future.

[Contact Us]
Official WeChat: 简单点 (E-GetS)
Hotline: +855 23 238 999
Merchant: EG@E-GetS.com

Official Website: https://www.e-gets.com/

SP Bakery is a cardless membership application that keeps your transaction amounts, points and enables you to earn discounts from merchant. It provides real-time updates on advertisements and promotions. You can obtain discounts by making purchases through it.

Get food delivery to your doorstep from thousands of amazing local and national restaurants. Find the meal you crave and order food from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your order in real-time.

FIND YOUR FAVOURITE FOOD & RESTAURANTS
Order food from nearby restaurants and search by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, and meal. 
Food delivery options for you to order and enjoy such as pizza, burritos, burgers, sushi, fish and chips, doughnuts and Chinese takeout.
Prefer pickup? Skip the line and reservations and choose to pick up your order instead. Choose your favourite delivery options with the Uber Eats app now.

SUBSCRIBE TO UBER ONE
For £5.99 per month, Uber One subscribers enjoy £0 delivery fee and up to 5% off orders over £15 at participating non-grocery stores (and 5% off orders over £25 at participating grocery stores) available on Uber Eats. Members are also eligible for rewards, perks, coupons, and offers. View full Uber One Terms & Conditions in app.

ORDER ALMOST ANYTHING, ANYTIME
Order household needs from your favourite pharmacies, supermarkets, and pet shops. Baby food or nappies, pharmacy needs, beauty products and cosmetics. Grocery staples like bread and milk, bananas and produce, flowers and plants, packaged foods or frozen treats. 

You can even order alcoholic drinks including beer, wine, spirits and cocktails.*

SIMPLE DELIVERY ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That’s it.
Uber Eats makes it easy to order food delivery online or through the app and have it delivered by restaurants and delivery people near you.
Or, schedule your order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER FOOD AHEAD WITH PICKUP
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and skip the lines to the restaurant to get your food.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food delivery order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated arrival time at your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

FIND SOME OF YOUR FAVOURITE NATIONAL RESTAURANTS
Some of our food delivery partners include: Pizza Hut, Domino’s Pizza, Burger King, Dunkin', KFC, McDonald's, Starbucks, Subway, Taco Bell,Costa Coffee, Kaspas, Gourmet Burger Kitchen, Franco Manca, Dixy Chicken, Chipotle, Chaiiwala, Amigos Burgers Shakes, Papa John’s, Krispy Kreme.  

FIND PHARMACIES, GROCERY STORES, AND MORE
Order from grocery stores such as Asda, Sainsbury Supermarket, Waitrose, The Co-op, Iceland, M&S Food, and Londis. You can also order from pharmacies such as Boots via Uber Eats, as well as from other delivery partners in the convenience and retail spaces.

ABOUT UBER EATS
Uber Eats is the way to order the food you love through an easy delivery experience. Uber Eats is available in hundreds of cities around the world. Enter your delivery address to explore restaurant and grocery delivery options near you.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY

Join others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order from their favourite restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Johannesburg, Glasgow, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Nashville, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, San Diego, San Francisco, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Warsaw, and Washington DC. Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in countries around the world. See full list of available countries on our website. Uber content/messages human- or machine-translated as per device settings; accuracy not guaranteed

*Alcohol is only available in select markets. Must be at least 18 to purchase. Item availability varies by market. See the Uber Eats app for details.

When you want pizza, you really want pizza. Luckily, our app is the quickest and easiest way to order one with a whole host of exclusive features. Want to know more? Course you do…


ORDER PIZZA

Scroll through our easy-order menu and treat yourself to an all-time classic or discover something new! You can even Create Your Own customised creation, give it a name and save it for next time. 


DELIVERY OR TAKEAWAY

Whether you want to collect from your local store or have your pizza delivered to your door, our app’s got you covered. With stores up and down the country, you’re sure to find a Domino’s Pizza near you. 


EXCLUSIVE PIZZA DEALS

If deals are your thing, you’ve come to the right place (almost). Download our app and you’ll find dozens of exclusive pizza deals to suit any budget (and any occasion). You can even add your vouchers to bag discounts on your order!


GROUP ORDERING

If you need to order pizza for the whole fam, you can set up a group order to make ordering for the gang a doddle. Just send them an invite, let them choose what they want and it’ll get added to the order! 


PRE-ORDERING

If you know you want pizza later, but you’re ready to order now…no worries. Get your order in early, let us know when you want it, and we’ll do the rest. Oh, and if you know you want the same as last time, you can just choose it from your order history! 


PAYMENT

Oh, and when it comes to settling up, you can pay pretty much however you like…using card, PayPal or with just a few taps thanks to Apple Pay. Plus, you can keep an eye on your pizza’s progress with our trusty pizza tracker.
 

So, if you haven’t downloaded our app yet, you’re missing out on everything you love about Domino’s and so much more. 

Hit the link to download now and see it with your own eyes!

By downloading and using this app, you confirm that you accept our Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy and Cookie Policy too.

UK
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/termsandconditions
https://www.dominos.co.uk/legal/content/privacypolicy

https://www.dominos.ie/legal/content/termsandconditions

Mob makes it easy to cook simple, delicious meals that fit your schedule - whether you're planning ahead or looking for a last-minute meal.

From speedy weeknight dinners to preppable breakfasts and packed lunches, we help you cook without the stress.

Key features:

Smart shopping list – Add everything in one tap, neatly organised by supermarket aisle.

Pre-built meal plans – Save time with curated weekly plans.

Search by ingredients – Got something to use up? We’ll show you what to cook.

Family-friendly recipes – Meals everyone will actually want to eat.

Cook with ease – Step-by-step recipes with your screen unlocked while you cook.

Delicious, reliable recipes – Tested by our team of in-house chefs.

Our Mission:

Mob is on a mission to make weekly cooking easy, fun, and delicious. We do this because cooking changes lives. It improves your health, lifts your mood, and saves you money.

Whether you're looking for a healthy dinner after work, a packed lunch for tomorrow, or a prep-friendly breakfast to start the day, Mob is here to help you cook incredible meals throughout the week.

Today, we're a community of over 500,000 home cooks. We make everyday cooking exciting and aspirational—not a chore. Not just a boring task that needs to be done, but something to look forward to, that results in a delicious meal.

We're building a movement of people who have cooking as an embedded part of their weekly routine. It's part of their life.

They are proud to say: "I'm a cook."

Try Mob Premium free for 7 days!

Get access to Mob’s full recipe library and premium features.

If you choose to purchase Mob Premium, your Apple account will be charged, once your trial has elapsed. Auto-renewal can be turned off at any time in your App Store settings after purchase. Cancelling will stop future charges, but you’ll keep premium features until the end of the current period. Deleting the app does not cancel your subscription.

Privacy Policy: https://www.mob.co.uk/privacy-policy

Terms of Service: https://www.mob.co.uk/terms-of-service

Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula

Keeta – The World’s Leading Food Delivery Service
Craving pizza, fried chicken, sushi, or something new? We’ve got you covered! Whether you’re in the mood for indulgent treats or healthy choices like fresh salads and light meals, Keeta delivers your favourites straight to your door. 

Why Choose Keeta?
1.Easy to Use – Order in seconds!
2.Daily Deals – Free delivery and discounts on every order!
3.Global Cuisines – Explore various tasty options.
4.On-time Promise – Your food arrives fresh and fast. 

How It Works:
1.Download Keeta and pick a restaurant.
2.Select your dishes and checkout.
3.Sit back and enjoy!

app_name: 悟空外卖: 泰国华人生活管家
description:
****** 本地生活业务 ******

依托悟空强大的外卖服务网络，现已在泰国中餐外卖领域呈垄断地位。并以外卖客户为基础提供优质的家政到家、本地知名餐厅预定、医疗健康、生活充值、房产置业、悟空本地便民服务，为在泰华人打造全面、高速、安全的综合服务平台。

[ 餐饮到家 ]
悟空海外的商超生鲜频道提供各类食材和生鲜产品，涵盖蔬菜、水果、肉类、豆制品、调味料等多种品类。用户可以方便地在悟空海外APP上浏览和选购，购物流程简单快捷。悟空海外商超生鲜频道的目标是为海外用户带来高品质的食材和生鲜产品，让用户享受来自家乡的味道和便利。

[ 服务到家 ]
悟空海外的到家服务频道是为用户提供一系列生活服务的平台，宠物寄养等等。这些服务都是由专业的服务供应商提供，确保用户能够获得高质量的服务体验。例如家庭保洁、空调维修、管道疏通、专业杀虫等。

[ 签证服务 ]
悟空海外的签证服务频道提供了便捷的签证协助申请服务，为用户提供从咨询到申请，再到签证结果反馈的全程服务。在选择对应的服务后，用户填写相应的申请表格和提供所需的材料。悟空海外将会为用户审核和整理申请材料，确保申请的准确性和完整性，并将申请材料提交至对应的使领馆。悟空海外的签证服务频道提供了全方位、高效、可靠的签证申请服务，为用户的海外旅行提供了强有力的保障。

[ 医疗健康 ]
悟空与泰国各大医疗机构深入合作，为来泰就医华人解决语言障碍、医师专业背景调研、医疗方案优化等专业问题。让华人在异国他乡也能达到最专业的医疗照顾和保障。

[ 房产置业 ]
悟空与泰国各大中介、房地产开发商深入合作，为客户提供真实、可靠、全面的房产信息。为客户筛选良莠不齐的泰国房产信息，在泰房产交易流程中提供咨询与协助服务，帮助用户顺利完成交易，轻松置业。

[ 虚拟服务 ]
悟空致力于为在泰华人提供方便快捷的生活服务，生活充值频道可以轻松充值在泰话费，全中文服务，只需几步即可完成充值操作，还支持多种支付方式。华人在泰日常生活的必备工具，省时省力、轻松缴费。

****** 旅游与娱乐业务 ******

Gokoo悟空海外创新了主题游的内容电商新模式，利用其深耕当地的强大落地能力和供应链能力，提供与传统旅行平台不同的差异化服务。悟空海外通过当地强大的落地能力，以及供应链能力和传统OTA平台的差异化服务，依托本地官方部门等独家资源，为中国游客提供高质量的旅游产品和相关服务。我们致力于解决中国游客在泰国旅游中遇到的所有不透明现象，让游客可以放心地出行。

[ 住宿预订 ]
悟空海外的酒店民宿频道是为旅客提供目的地特色酒店、民宿、公寓等住宿选择的平台。为了保证用户的住宿质量，悟空会对所有房源进行审核和筛选，确保房源的安全、卫生、便利等条件满足要求。悟空海外酒店民宿频道会对所有房源进行实名认证和安全审核，确保用户的住宿安全和隐私。

[交通预订]
悟空海外的用车频道是一项为海外游客提供高品质、便捷、安全的汽车租赁、包车、接送机等服务的频道。悟空海外的用车频道提供多种车型选择，包括经济型、商务型、豪华型、大巴等，用户可以根据需求和预算选择适合自己的车型。预订时，用户只需填写行程和用车信息，即可在线支付预订费用，非常方便快捷。在租车期间，悟空海外也提供24小时客服支持，确保用户在使用租车服务时无后顾之忧。

[ 餐厅预订 ]
悟空与中国头部旅游平台合作，为华人用户提供信息专业、预约便捷、服务优质的餐饮甄选，并为在泰华人提供更多增值服务。

[ 景区门票预订 ]
悟空海外的旅游频道提供各种景点景区项目的预定服务，包括热门泰国经典、热门亲子游项目、打卡泰国特色佛教文化景点等。通过在悟空海外APP上进行预定，游客可以享受优惠价格和快捷预定的服务。

[ 玩乐预订 ]
悟空海外的娱乐预定频道提供各种娱乐项目的预定服务，包括热门音乐节、比赛席位、夜店酒吧、KTV、livehouse等。通过在悟空海外APP上进行预定，游客可以享受优惠价格和快捷预定的服务。同时，悟空海外的娱乐预定频道也会提供详细的项目介绍、场馆位置、预定流程以及注意事项等信息，帮助游客更好地了解和规划行程。另外，悟空海外还会不断地更新和推出新的娱乐项目，满足不同游客的需求。无论是家庭出游、情侣约会、还是朋友聚会，悟空海外的娱乐预定频道都能为游客提供多样化的选择和方便的预定服务。


[ 高端定制游 ]
悟空海外的高端定制频道提供一站式定制旅游服务，为客户量身打造独一无二的旅游体验。我们拥有经验丰富的旅游专家，能够根据客户的需求和喜好，为其制定行程计划、酒店选择、活动安排等，并提供专业的私人导游服务，确保客户在旅途中得到最优质的服务和体验。包括精品酒店、私人游艇、豪华租车、特色餐厅等，可为客户打造独一无二的奢华旅游体验。我们也提供一系列主题旅游产品，如文化遗产游、私人探险游、高尔夫游、蜜月旅行等，帮助客户实现自己心中理想的旅游计划。

[ 祈福 ]
悟空海外的祈福频道是为用户提供全方位的祈福服务，包括佛牌饰品、祈福法事等，为用户提供丰富的泰国祈福体验。悟空海外的祈福频道致力于为用户提供便捷、专业、个性化的祈福服务，让用户在海外也能感受到泰国的祈福文化。

developer: Talabat General Trading and Contracting Company
description:
Hey! Looking for the quickest food delivery? That’s easy with our new talabat app.

Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We’ve got it all – fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

"Pay online or in cash"
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you’re ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

"Track your order from start to finish"
That’s right; follow your delivery from the moment it’s confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery – we’ve got you.

"Find exclusive deals"
Downloading the talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We’re more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you’ll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and Egypt.

Happy ordering.

McDonald's Official App for Japan
The McDonald's official app offers not only daily coupons and latest information but also allows you to complete your order and payment seamlessly.



Features Available:
• Access to the Latest Coupons
Enjoy exclusive coupons that can be used in-store or through mobile orders. Show the coupon number to the staff by selecting "Use in Store" or choose a coupon from the mobile order menu category.
• Check McDonald’s Menu
Access detailed information about McDonald's products, including ingredients, allergy information, and nutritional content.
• Discover the Latest News
Find recommended news and products tailored to you right on the home screen.
• Order and pay via the App with Mobile Order
You can complete your order and payment entirely through the app. Skip the line and receive your food directly at your table (not available in certain restaurants or hours).
• Order from home and have your meal delivered by McDelivery® Service via the App.



How to Use Mobile Order:
Step 1: Log In
To use coupons or place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Choose a Restaurant
Select the restaurant where you would like to receive your order. Please check the available restaurants in the app.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items. Coupons can also be used. Please note that some coupons available for mobile orders may differ from those available at the Front Counter.
Step 4: Choose Your Pickup Method
Select from table delivery (table service), counter pickup, takeout, park & go, or Drive-Thru. Pickup options may vary by restaurant and time. Table service, park & go, and drive-thru are not available at all locations.
Step 5: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with a credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-Barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay .
Please Complete the Following Step After Arriving at the Restaurant
Step 6: Receive Your Order
Once you arrive at the restaurant, confirm your payment to start the preparation of your order. Enjoy your freshly prepared food.



How to Use McDelivery® Service:
Step 1: Log In
To place an order, you need to register and log in. If you've forgotten your password, you can reset it via the "Forgot Password" option. Please ensure that you can receive emails from info@nsp.mdj.jp.
Step 2: Select Delivery Address and Time
Choose whether you want to order now or reserve a delivery time. Reservations can be made from one day to two hours prior to the desired delivery time.
Step 3: Select Your Menu
Choose your favorite menu items.
Step 4: Choose Your Payment Method
You can pay with cash, credit card (VISA, Master, JCB, Diners, American Express), d-barai, PayPay, Rakuten Pay, au PAY, LINE Pay, or Apple Pay . Please note that cash payments are not available at some locations.
Step 5: Receive Your Order
Our delivery staff will bring your freshly prepared meal to your specified address. If you prefer a no-contact delivery, you can select the "Leave at the Door" option when ordering.
• Please note:
  • Delivery times vary by location.
  • Orders for the breakfast menu must be placed by 10:20 AM.
  • Minimum order value is ¥1,500 (¥1,000 for breakfast).
  • A delivery fee of ¥300 applies.

КУХНЯ.РФ —  простые и вкусные рецепты на каждый день с пошаговыми видео. Ежедневные рекомендации что приготовить на завтрак, обед или ужин: от супов и десертов до блюд правильного питания (ПП). Пошаговые рецепты с видео помогут новичкам готовить уверенно и без ошибок. Приложение содержит тысячи блюд от известных шеф-поваров, подскажет время приготовления и автоматически подсчитает количество ингредиентов для необходимого количество порций на всю вашу семью.


Что есть в КУХНЯ.РФ: 
- Рецепты на каждый день: вкусные идеи для завтрака, обеда и ужина. 
- Пошаговые видео‑инструкции: готовьте уверенно даже без опыта. 
- Тысячи простых рецептов: супы, десерты, выпечка, гарниры, ПП (правильное питание).
- Пересчет порций: точные граммовки на 1, 2, 3, 4+ человек. 
- Оценка времени: узнавайте, сколько займет приготовление.


Для кого:
- Новичкам — понятные и наглядные видео шаги и подсказки по приготовлению. 
- Занятым — быстрые и простые рецепты на каждый день. 
- Семьям — автоматическая подстановка ингредиентов на нужное число персон. 
- Тем, кто на ПП — полезные и сбалансированные блюда.


Что вы сможете приготовить: 
- Завтраки: омлеты, сырники, овсянка, тосты.
- Основные блюда: мясо, птица, рыба.
- Ужины и обеды: паста, котлеты, рагу, запеканки. 
- Супы: крем‑супы, борщ, куриные, овощные. 
- Десерты: пироги, печенье, муссы, чизкейки. 
- ПП‑рецепты: салаты, блюда на пару, запеченные овощи и мясо.
- Тематические подборки: рецепты для мультиварок, для духовки, на сковороде
- Праздничные рецепты: рецепты на Новый год и Рождество, рецепты на Масленицу, Пасху, 8 марта и 23 февраля.
- Рецепты для детей: детские блюда и рецепты для детских столов.


Почему КУХНЯ.РФ: 
- Понятно — каждый шаг показан на видео. 
- Вкусно — рецепты от проверенных шеф‑поваров. 
- Удобно — порции и время готовки под ваши планы.


Ищете простые рецепты на каждый день, быстрые блюда на ужин, супы, десерты или ПП‑рецепты с пошаговыми видео? КУХНЯ.РФ поможет готовить с удовольствием — быстро, просто и вкусно. Устанавливайте приложение бесплатно и начинайте готовить уже сегодня!

اكسب واستبدل نقاط Smiles على جميع المعاملات على الأكل والبقالة والخدمات المنزلية والتسوق والسفر والمزيد.

هل تحتاج إلى مساعدة في أعمال المنزل؟ لدينا أكثر من 35 خدمة منزلية لمساعدتك في التعامل مع قائمة مهامك، بدءاً من خدمات التنظيف المنزلي والصيانة وخدمات الصالون وسبا إلى الغسيل وغسيل السيارات.
 

انضم إلى حلقة من التوفير بلا حدود مع Smiles Unlimited. احصل على توصيل مجاني على طلبات الأكل والبقالة، وبدون رسوم خدمة على حجز الخدمات المنزلية وعروض اشترِ 1 واحصل على 1 مجاناً بلا حدود.
